original_text: The Levites stood with the instruments of David, and the priests with the trumpets.
korean_text: 레위 사람은 다윗의 악기를 잡고 제사장은 나팔을 잡고 서매

sentences.original_text: The Levites stood with the instruments of David
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람들은 다윗의 악기들과 함께 섰습니다

sentences.original_text: and the priests with the trumpets
